about.heading: About AgroSmart
about.description: We're on a mission to revolutionize farming through technology, making sustainable agriculture accessible to farmers worldwide.

mission.heading: Our Mission
mission.description: AgroSmart combines cutting-edge technology with agricultural expertise to help farmers make informed decisions, increase yields, and practice sustainable farming.
list: Build a community of modern farmers

list.title: Trust & Reliability
list.description: We provide accurate, scientifically-backed information you can rely on.

list.title: Community First
list.description: We believe in the power of knowledge sharing and community support.

list.title: Excellence
list.description: We strive for excellence in every tool and resource we provide.
